articles.title: Lowell police seeking public’s help with details about fatal hit-and-run
articles.description:
Police have identified the vehicle involved in the incident, but are still calling upon the public to share any further details.

The post Lowell police seeking public’s help with details about fatal hit-and-run appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lowell police investigate a fatal hit-and-run incident seeking public assistance.
Authorities have identified the vehicle involved but need more details from witnesses.
Residents are urged to report any information to help solve the case.

articles.title: Zohran Mamdani wins NYC mayor’s race, capping a stunning ascent
articles.description:
With the victory, the democratic socialist will etch his place in history as the city’s first Muslim mayor, the first of South Asian heritage and the first born in Africa.

The post Zohran Mamdani wins NYC mayor’s race, capping a stunning ascent appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Zohran Mamdani elected as NYC's first Muslim mayor on November 4, 2025.
Mamdani is also the first mayor of South Asian heritage and born in Africa.
His victory may inspire Boston's diverse communities to engage in local politics.

articles.title: ‘This is just the beginning’: Nonbinding Israel divestment ballot question passes in Somerville
articles.description:
Question 3 asks voters whether Somerville officials should divest from companies that “engage in business that sustains Israel’s apartheid, genocide and illegal occupation of Palestine."

The post ‘This is just the beginning’: Nonbinding Israel divestment ballot question passes in Somerville  appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Somerville voters approved a nonbinding divestment question regarding Israel on November 4.
Question 3 targets companies supporting Israel's actions in Palestine, reflecting local sentiment.
The decision may influence future city policies and community discussions on international issues.
